revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=AsiaRF |model=AP7260 |revision=MPE-1 |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date=05/09/2016 |fcc_date= |manuf_country= |is_manuf=Yes |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=new |type=module |fcc_id= |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=Mini USB |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7620A |cpu1_cspeed=580 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM68B16CWQD-25H |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe, USB 2.0 |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial=yes |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7620A |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |wi2_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi2_chip1_model=MT7610E |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=1 |wi2_rxchains=1 |wi2_sstreams=1 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports= |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|AC600 WiFi Router}} :[http://www.asiarf.com/11ac-WiFi-Router-in-mini-PCIe-form-factor-included-USB-to-Ethernet-AP7620-MPE-1-product-view-399.html Product page] ''Module in Mini PCIe form factor included USB to Ethernet'' :Flash/RAM may vary, defaults are specified as 8MB/64MB
===Features=== *Chipset: [[MediaTek]] MT7620A/MT7610E :(with Ethernet to USB Interface) *Flash 8/16MB, Memory: DDR2 64/128MB *Interface: 1x Mini PCIe, USB 2.0 (pins) *Standard: 802.11abgn/ac, Bandwidth: 20/40/80MHz *Wireless LAN: 1T1R Mode (150+433 Mbps) *Antenna: 1x iPex connector (PIFA opt.) *Multi-mode support: Access Point/Client *Support Multiple SSID, WPS *High security with build-in: WEP 64/128, :TKIP, WPA, WPA2 mix, 802.1x and 802.11i *802.1x Authentication with RADIUS Client
===Reviews=== *[http://www.cnx-software.com/2016/07/26/asiarf-ap7620-mpe-1-openwrt-wifi-router-mini-pcie-card-is-made-for-computers-and-embedded-systems/ ''AsiaRF AP7260 MPE-1'' on '''CNX-Software'''] :*SoC: [[MediaTek MT7620A]] @580MHz ([[MIPS 24KEc]] CPU) ::with 2T2R Wi-Fi 802.11bgn (but board only supports 1Ã—1) :*WiFI Chipset: [[MediaTek]] MT7610E 802.11ac 1T1R (433 Mbps) :*System Memory: 64/128MB (DDR2), Storage: 8/16MB (SPI flash) :*WiFI features: 802.1x Authentication with RADIUS Client ::Security: 64/128-bit WEP, TKIP, WPA, WPA2, AES; ::Multi-mode support: Access Point/Client, Support Multiple SSID :*Mini PCIe interface with USB2.0 to Eth, UART, 8 GPIO, 1.5/3.3V :*Dimensions: 60x41.5 mm (bigger than standard mini card: 50x30 mm)
